title: Minister dismisses Trump’s claim illegal migration ‘destroys countries from within’ – UK politics live
summary: UK Business Secretary Peter Kyle dismissed a suggestion from US President Joe Biden to deploy the UK military for preventing illegal migration. He emphasized that addressing this issue requires cooperation rather than military intervention. Kyle's remarks highlight the UK's stance on handling migration challenges.

title: Geelong v Hawthorn: AFL 2025 first preliminary final – live
summary: The Cats and the Hawks face off at the MCG, competing for a spot in the grand final. The match is closely followed by Martin Pegan, who provides goal-by-goal updates. Tension and excitement build as the two teams battle for victory.

title: World Athletics Championships 2025: 200m finals, heptathlon and more – live
summary: Yara El-Shaboury provides updates on the seventh night of events in Tokyo. Key highlights include the finals for both the men's and women's 200m races. Viewers can expect exciting performances and results.

title: Israel army says it will use ‘unprecedented force’ in Gaza City and urges residents to leave – Middle East crisis live
summary: The Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) have urged residents of Gaza City to evacuate south for safety. However, they have closed the Sala al-Din road, which was a key evacuation route. This has heightened concerns over the ability of civilians to safely leave the area amid ongoing conflict.

title: European Commission puts forward new package of sanctions against Russia – Europe live
summary: Ursula von der Leyen and EU foreign policy chief Kaja Kallas are scheduled to announce important details in a press statement today. The specifics of their announcement have not been disclosed yet. Further information is expected to clarify the context of their address.
